item.title: Firefox - Can't log into SSRS Web Portal NTLM
item.description: If you keep getting prompted by Firefox for your logon credentials, then the logon goes away and pops right back up, try the following fix. Enter about:config in Firefox Find the setting network.automatic-ntlm-auth.trusted-uris Edit it to include the URL of your reporting server Additional NOTES: To do something like adding the intranet zone you may also have to edit network.automatic-ntlm-auth.allow-non-fqdn to true You can add an entire domain by adding:
